about_the_game:
Idle Grid

A minimalist factory-building idle game where efficiency meets strategy. Design, expand, and optimize your industrial empire on a dynamic grid system.

Gameplay

Build and manage an ever-growing network of factories, power plants, and research facilities in this addictive idle game. Place buildings strategically to maximize their efficiency through proximity bonuses and upgrade paths.

Key Features:

🏭 Strategic Building Placement

* Position factories next to power plants for maximum efficiency

* Create research clusters to boost production

* Use compactors to multiply your factory outputs

* Every building placement matters with the adjacency bonus system

⚡ Power Management

* Balance power production and consumption

* Build backup power storage for emergencies

* Manage brownouts and blackouts strategically

* Upgrade power plants to meet growing demands

📈 Deep Progression System

* Three upgrade tiers for every building type

* Multiple upgrade strategies:

  * Single building upgrades

  * Max level upgrades

  * Mass upgrade all buildings of the same type

* Research facilities provide stackable income bonuses

🏗️ Building Types

* Factories - Your primary income generators

* Power Plants - Keep your grid running

* Research Labs - Boost factory efficiency

* Warehouses - Expand storage capacity

* Compactors - Multiply factory output

💾 Quality of Life Features

* Auto-save system

* Export/Import save files

* Zoom and pan controls

* Keyboard shortcuts for quick actions

* Clear visual feedback for all actions

Endless Optimization

Every decision matters in Idle Grid. Will you focus on maximizing factory output, research efficiency, or power generation? Create your own strategies and watch your industrial empire grow while you're away.

Perfect for both active management and idle progression, Idle Grid offers a satisfying blend of strategic depth and incremental growth.
